name: catalyst
description: Research-driven development workflow with Linear integration, PM tools, and infrastructure research agents

plugins.name: catalyst-dev
plugins.description: Complete development workflow: research → plan → implement → validate → ship with Linear automation. Includes 10 research agents (codebase + infrastructure), 18 commands (workflow, dev, handoff, Linear/PM, project), and 4 scripts.

plugins.name: catalyst-meta
plugins.description: Discover, import, and create workflows: learn from community patterns and extend Catalyst. Includes 5 commands for workflow discovery and creation.
